meanings.definition: To dye or color with a bedye.
meanings.sent1: I will bedye this fabric blue for my project.
meanings.sent2: She decided to bedye her hair a vibrant red.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally bedyed his hands green while working on the painting.
meanings.sent4: The sunset bedyed the sky with shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The children happily watched as the rainbow bedyed the sky after the rain.

meanings.sent1: The bedye she used for the fabric was a beautiful shade of purple.
meanings.sent2: He bought a bottle of bedye to color his old t-shirt.
meanings.sent3: The bedye spilled all over the table, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The bedye in the container had a strong, pleasant smell.
meanings.sent5: The bedye transformed the plain white cloth into a work of art.
